Reset.Title: Reset settings to default
Reset.Label: Reset Rest Recovery Settings
Reset.Hint: This will reset all of the module's settings back to their defaults.

EnableWounds.Name: Enable Wounds
EnableWounds.Hint: Enable Wounds rules. Includes Injuries and Bleeding.

LogLevel.Name: Log Level
LogLevel.Hint: The level of logs to place into the console.

ResetSettings.Title: Grit & Glory | Reset Settings
ResetSettings.Content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the Grit & Glory module settings' to their defaults?
